bill.title: MS Windstorm Underwriting Association Reinsurance Fund; levy assessment on insurance premiums to be deposited in.
bill.description: An Act To Levy An Additional Assessment Upon Every Insurance Premium For Which Insurance Premium Tax Revenue Is Collected Under The Provisions Of Section 27-15-103 Et Seq. Of One-half Of One Percent Of The Gross Amount Of Premium Receipts Received From, And On Insurance Policies And Contracts Written In, Or Covering Risks Located In This State; To Require Insurers To Remit This Additional Assessment To The Department Of Revenue At The Same Time As They Remit Insurance Premium Tax Revenue Collected Under The Provisions Of Section 27-15-103 Et Seq.; To Require The Department Of Revenue To Annually Deposit The Monies Received From The Additional Assessment Levied Under This Section Into The Mississippi Windstorm Underwriting Association Reinsurance Assistance Fund; To Bring Forward Sections 83-34-1 Through 83-34-37, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Are Provisions Of Law Regarding The Mississippi Windstorm Underwriting Association, For The Purposes Of Amendment; And For Related Purposes.
